thread.title: Robin Lopez's mascot feud escalates after Magic mascot embarrasses him
thread.title_full: Robin Lopez's mascot feud escalates after Magic mascot embarrasses him

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Robin Lopez's mascot feud escalates after Magic mascot embarrasses him
text:
THEY’RE NOT GONNA TAKE IT!
In a rare victory in the ongoing battle between NBA mascots and Robin Lopez, Stuff the Magic Dragon taunted Bulls center without too much backlash.
Hey @RoLopez42 , @STUFFMagic says . pic.twitter.com/jZGmLPHAJ7 
— Orlando Magic (@OrlandoMagic) January 25, 2017 Ahh, nothing like a classic fart joke. I’m ashamed of myself for laughing, but laugh I did.
After a few whacks with the signs, Stuff made his escape while some Magic players blocked Lopez off during warmups.
Stuff taunted him from the other end of the court. This must be revenge for the time Lopez powerbombed him in 2015 . Will Lopez come out on top, though? 
Unfortunately for the mascots of the NBA, he usually does.
Lopez: 932
Mascots: 1
